summary: Provides the core implementation for DreamBooth fine‑tuning of text‑to‑image diffusion models, with a specialized class that orchestrates the full training pipeline on Megatron‑scale architectures, handling model setup, dataset collation, forward/backward passes, optimizer steps, checkpoint management, and adapter integration for parallel gradient computation.
business_intent: Empower developers and researchers to efficiently customize large diffusion models for specific visual concepts by leveraging DreamBooth on high‑performance Megatron training infrastructure.
